neg review: Maria is super nice and always tries her best to help me:) the room is super clean and beautiful

pos review: The host, Maria, was a wonderful host and quite a character.  She gave us all the information we needed for our stay in Bruges.  She cooked us an exceptional omelet every morning along with fresh bread and homemade jam, salami, cheese, and the best coffee.  Her price was a very good price, the location was great, and she offered us a {costs extra} garage for our car which was a big plus.  We would stay there again for sure.
Very good localisation and very noce owner

Maria was amazing! great value for money, great location- really close to centre of Bruge. Was surprised to find the parking space was a garage which made me feel that my car was safe. Will definitely stay again. Thank you Maria
Quiet and convenient location Great welcome with map and directions
neg review: Not enough orange juice for everyone at breakfast  Too much conversation not understood to other Belgian quests at breakfast

pos review: Near the center of the city and near the railway station
neg review: The host lives in that house

pos review: Maria is a very nice Host. Nice place to stay for a night on Brugge.
